questions.questionText: Who should you tell your password to?
questions.myraHint: Think about who you can trust the most!

questions.questionText: Who should you tell your password to?
questions.myraHint: Looks like this data was corrupted, can you fill in the missing piece?

questions.questionText: Who should you tell your password to?
questions.myraHint: Oh no! The data has been scrambled - can you decipher the answer?

questions.questionText: What information is safe to share online?
It's okay to accept friend requests from people you don't know.
